subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Francis Joyon of France broke the around-the-world solo sailing record Sunday, finishing in 57 days 13 hours 34 minutes 6 seconds — more than 14 days faster than Ellen MacArthur’s 2005 trip.Joyon completed the circumnavigation soon after midnight off the French Atlantic coast, according to his Web site.
snippet: Francis Joyon of France broke the around-the-world solo sailing record Sunday, finishing in 57 days 13 hours 34 minutes 6 seconds — more than 14 days faster than Ellen MacArthur’s 2005 trip.Joyon completed the circumnavigation soon after midnight...
